trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<cookieHandler>" name="<cookieHandler>" href=""></xref> configuration element.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<cookieHandler>" name="<cookieHandler>" href=""> </xref> elemento de configuração.

trans-unit.source: The `<cookieHandler>` element is a child element of the `<federatedAuthentication>` element; the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthenticationElement.CookieHandler%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to an instance of the CookieHandlerElement class.
trans-unit.target: O `<cookieHandler>` é um elemento filho do `<federatedAuthentication>` elemento; a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthenticationElement.CookieHandler%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é definida como uma instância da classe CookieHandlerElement.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthenticationElement.CookieHandler%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The `<cookieHandler>` element is used to configure the cookie handler used by the Session Authentication Module (SAM), which is represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: O `<cookieHandler>` elemento é usado para configurar o manipulador de cookie usado por sessão de autenticação do módulo (SAM), que é representado pela <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>classe.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: A cookie handler can be configured in one of the following ways: - To configure a chunked cookie handler, set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property to either <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> and set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> property with the configuration element for your chunked cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador de cookie pode ser configurado em uma das seguintes maneiras: - para configurar um manipulador de cookie em partes, defina o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>propriedade como <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>ou <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>e defina o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>propriedade com o elemento de configuração para o manipulador de cookie em partes.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> property should not be set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>propriedade não deve ser definida.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To configure a chunked cookie handler with the default chunk size, you can set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property as mentioned earlier, but leave both the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> properties unset.
trans-unit.target: -Para configurar um manipulador de cookie em partes com o tamanho da parte padrão, você pode definir o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>propriedade conforme mencionado anteriormente, mas deixe ambos o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>e o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>propriedades não definidas.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To configure a custom cookie handler, set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property to <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> and set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> property with the configuration element that identifies the type of your custom cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: -Para configurar um manipulador de cookie personalizado, defina o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>propriedade <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>e defina o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>propriedade com o elemento de configuração que identifica o tipo do seu manipulador de cookie personalizado.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This type must derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler> class.
trans-unit.target: Esse tipo deve derivar da <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler>classe</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler> de

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> property should not be set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>propriedade não deve ser definida.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a chunked cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um manipulador de cookie em partes.

trans-unit.source: This property is equivalent to the `<chunkedCookieHandler>` child element of the `<cookieHandler>` element.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é equivalente a `<chunkedCookieHandler>` elemento filho do `<cookieHandler>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: It specifies a chunked cookie handler, an instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler> class, to use.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um manipulador de cookie em partes, uma instância do <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler>classe a ser usada.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler>

trans-unit.source: If it is set, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property should be set to either <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>.
trans-unit.target: Se for definido, a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>propriedade deve ser definida para um <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>ou <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property is set to either of these values but the ChunkedCookieHandler property is not set, a chunked cookie handler with the default chunk size (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler.DefaultChunkSize?displayProperty=fullName>) is configured.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>propriedade estiver definida para qualquer um desses valores, mas a propriedade ChunkedCookieHandler não está definido, um manipulador de cookie em partes com o tamanho da parte padrão (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler.DefaultChunkSize?displayProperty=fullName>) está configurado.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler.DefaultChunkSize?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Either the ChunkedCookieHandler property or the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> property may be set, but not both.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ChunkedCookieHandler ou <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>propriedade pode ser conjunto, mas não ambos.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandlerElement"></xref> that provides additional configuration for the chunked cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandlerElement"> </xref> que fornece configuração adicional para o manipulador de cookie em partes.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom cookie handler type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um tipo de manipulador de cookie personalizado.

trans-unit.source: This property must be set when a custom cookie handler is being configured.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade deve ser definida quando um manipulador de cookie personalizado está sendo configurado.

trans-unit.source: This property is equivalent to the `<customCookieHandler>` child element of the `<cookieHandler>` element.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é equivalente a `<customCookieHandler>` elemento filho do `<cookieHandler>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: It specifies a custom cookie handler type to use.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um tipo de manipulador de cookie personalizado para usar.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade for definida, a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>propriedade deve ser definida como <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The custom type specified by this property must be derived from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler> class.
trans-unit.target: O tipo personalizado especificado por essa propriedade deve ser derivado da <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler>classe</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler> de

trans-unit.source: Either the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> property or the CustomCookieHandler property may be set, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Tanto o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>propriedade ou a propriedade CustomCookieHandler pode ser conjunto, mas não ambos.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.CustomTypeElement"></xref> that defines the custom cookie handler type.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.CustomTypeElement"> </xref> que define o tipo de manipulador de cookie personalizado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the domain value for cookies written by the handler.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de domínio para o cookie gravado pelo manipulador.

trans-unit.source: Represents the `domain` attribute of the [\<cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) element.
trans-unit.target: Representa o `domain` atributo o [ \< cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) elemento.

trans-unit.source: The domain value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de domínio.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: Gets a new cookie handler based on the configuration properties.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um novo manipulador de cookie com base nas propriedades de configuração.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a cookie handler that is consistent with the configuration.
trans-unit.target: Esse método retorna um manipulador de cookie que é consistente com a configuração.

trans-unit.source: The cookie handler returned will be either a chunked cookie handler or a custom cookie handler depending on how the configuration properties are set.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de cookie retornado será um manipulador de cookie em partes ou um manipulador de cookie personalizado dependendo de como configurar as propriedades de configuração.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement>

trans-unit.source: The cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de cookie.

trans-unit.source: This will be an instance of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler"></xref> or <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler"></xref> depending on the kind of handler that is configured by the properties of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Isso será uma instância de <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler"> </xref> dependendo do tipo de manipulador que é configurada com as propriedades da instância atual.

trans-unit.source: A cookie handler cannot be created from the properties of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível criar um manipulador de cookie as propriedades da instância atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <xref uid="langword_csharp_httpOnly" name="httpOnly" href=""></xref> property of the cookies written by this handler should be set.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se o <xref uid="langword_csharp_httpOnly" name="httpOnly" href=""> </xref> propriedade dos cookies escritos por esse manipulador deverá ser definida.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref uid="langword_csharp_httpOnly" name="httpOnly" href=""></xref> property should be set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref uid="langword_csharp_httpOnly" name="httpOnly" href=""> </xref> propriedade deve ser definida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cookie handler mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modo de manipulador de cookie.

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode"></xref> value that indicates the kind of cookie handler that is being configured.
trans-unit.target: Uma opção válida <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode"> </xref> valor que indica o tipo de manipulador de cookie que está sendo configurado.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode"></xref>, which indicates a chunked cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode"> </xref>, que indica que um manipulador de cookie em partes.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base name for any cookies written by the handler.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome de base para qualquer cookie gravado pelo manipulador.

trans-unit.source: Represents the `name` attribute of the [\<cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) element.
trans-unit.target: Representa o `name` atributo o [ \< cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) elemento.

trans-unit.source: The base name for the cookies.
trans-unit.target: O nome de base para os cookies.

trans-unit.source: The default is “FedAuth”.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é "FedAuth".

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path value for cookies written by the handler.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor do caminho de cookie gravado pelo manipulador.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o caminho.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the lifetime of cookies issued by the handler.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tempo de vida de cookies emitidos pelo manipulador.

trans-unit.source: Represents the `persistentSessionLifetime` attribute of the [\<cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) element.
trans-unit.target: Representa o `persistentSessionLifetime` atributo o [ \< cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) elemento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that represents the cookie lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.TimeSpan>que representa o tempo de vida do cookie.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The default is 0 days (“0.0:0:0”).
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0 dias ("0.0:0:0").

trans-unit.source: The value must be a value between 0 (“0.0:0:0”) and 365 (“365.0:0:0”) days.
trans-unit.target: O valor deve ser um valor entre 0 ("0.0:0:0") e 365 dias ("365.0:0:0").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the cookie should be used only with SSL.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se o cookie deve ser usado somente com SSL.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cookie should only be used over an SSL connection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o cookie deve ser usado apenas em uma conexão SSL; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
